about_the_game:
Adventure Forge is a creative tool kit designed to empower aspiring designers, writers, and artists to make the narrative video games we have always dreamed of. A collection of powerful tools for character, location, interface, and narrative design are driven by a contextual drop-down logic system that enables deep game design without the need to program code or write scripts.

Adventure Forge empowers you to mix many forms of narrative games, to bring your unique game design and story to life. From Choose-Your-Own-Path style of interactive dialogs, to Visual Novels, to story rich Hidden Object Games, all the way to highly interactive isometric RPGs.





Adventure Forge offers a selection of existing universes to choose from. Each contains all the tools you would need to create your game. From portraits, 3D character models and animations, terrain tiles, props, decals, and 2D animations allow you to focus on game mechanics and story immediately,

You can also add your own artwork, animations, music, to your Adventure so you can customise your game any way you want.

Adventure Forge also comes with a story-centric free universe; Tales of Fortunata, a new story world set in a magical version of Renaissance Venice, created by Jordan Weisman and Sean Stewart.





Adventure Forge also lets you import your own assets in your games. Create backgrounds, terrain tiles, props, 3D models and animations, compose your own music, and design your characters, then bring them into the platform and infuse them with life.



Adventure Forge allows you to let others discover your stories. Push a button and share your game with the community of Adventure Forge’s players. Want to keep it only for your friends? No problem. Share it just with them. Prefer to open it to the whole community? Go for it!

Want to charge players for your game or sell your Universe for others to make games within? You will be able to when Adventure Forge reaches full release.



We will be watching for games that get traction in the Adventure Forge community, and if we think that your game has potential as a stand alone title, we will reach out to you to discuss investing in and publishing your game as a stand alone title in all the App stores that make sense for the game you’ve created.

RICH ISOMETRIC LEVEL DESIGN TOOL

‣ Interactive and animated terrain and props
‣ Interactive lighting
‣ Spatially oriented sound effects and music
‣ Demarcation of zones and tiles for use in game logic

CHARACTER TOOL

‣ Determine attributes, select portraits, 3D models, and animations to represent the character in scenes. Establish states so the character can change during the course of play.

NO CODE OR SCRIPTING REQUIRED TO CREATE SOPHISTICATED GAME LOGIC

‣ Our system leverages the power of language via highly contextual dropdown menus so it’s impossible to get syntax wrong.

EXTENSIVE BRANCHING NARRATIVE AND CONVERSATION TOOL

‣ Create Choose Your Own Path games, conversations within Visual Novels, and isometric RPG scenes all in the same tool.
‣ Portraits, character poses, and extensive game interactions can all be driven by dialog choices.

ISOMETRIC EXPLORE MODE

‣ Player characters can navigate in real time through isometric locations going over, under, and through interactive terrain and props, can interact with NPCs in the level, and discover puzzles and other mini-games.

2D INTERACTIVE TOOL

‣ A powerful tool to create almost any kind of interface or mini-game needed to challenge, inform, or entertain your players.

AUDIO DESIGN TOOL

‣ Empowers designers to balance music, sound effects, and dialog to create a compelling soundscape for each scene.

THOUSANDS OF ASSETS TO BUILD YOUR GAMES

‣ The ability to upload new tiles, props, animations, or sound files as needed to bring your vision to life.

content_descriptors.notes: Adventure Forge is a platform that empowers aspiring designers, writers, and artists to create their own narrative games. While the content Endless Adventures publishes on the platform will not include mature content, content from our creator community may. All such content will be tagged by the creators within the application.

short_description: Make your own narrative-rich games: Choose Your Own Path, Visual Novels, Hidden Object Games, and even full isometric RPGs - all with no code required. Adventure Forge is a game creation platform from legendary designer Jordan Weisman (BattleTech, MechWarrior, Shadowrun, Crimson Skies).
